Title: Tokyo Gas acquires majority stake in Chevron’s Haynesville upstream assets
Description: Tokyo Gas’s subsidiary TG Natural Resources (TGNR) has announced that it has closed on a transaction to acquire a 70% interest Chevron’s East Texas gas assets for $525 million
Author: JS

Title: Australia’s Viva Energy seeks FSRU for Geelong LNG import terminal
Description: Australian energy company is seeking a floating storage regasification unit (FSRU) for its proposed LNG import terminal in Geelong, Australia.
Author: JS
